title: As per Government of India, MoD, SRO
clause_text: As per Government of India, MoD, SRO.No.4, dated 13th January, 2010 which was published in Part - II, Section - 4 of Gazette Notification dated 23rd January, 2010. Air Force Station Thane falls within the 100 m. restriction zone. As per notification, no construction should be permitted within the restricted zone of 100 m. from the outer parapet of the Air Force boundary. Similarly, live hedges, tree/rows or clumps of trees or orchards shall not be maintained, planted, added to or altered within the 100 m. restricted zone. The restriction is equally applicable for construction of underground structure, wherein no digging and / or change in the level of ground is permitted within the notified zone.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
